name: Sleepy Owl
description:
[ Description ]

These owl beanies are super cute!! Make and Adopt one for YOUR little one :) Made of soft cotton.

[ Size ]

Newborn 12-14" 
0-3m 14-15" 
3-6m 15-16" 
6-12m 16-17.5" 
12-24m 17.5-18.5" 
2T-4T 18.5-19.5" 
Child 20-21" 
Teen 21-22" 
Adult 23" 
Adult L 24"


[ Production Time ]

MADE TO ORDER, check shop description for production times. This does not include shipping time once item is mailed.

[Shipping]

USPS First Class services are used, average time is 3-5 days in US. Upgrade to Priority is available, email me PRIOR to purchase for separate listing.

[ Care.Instructions ]

Hand wash with mild soap in cold water. Do not twist to dry, gently press out excess water. Reshape and lay flat to dry. Placing in washing machine may unravel, ruin, felt item. Do not leave infants/children unattended in prop.

[ Questions ]

Please ask questions by emailing me prior to purchasing. littleowlcreations@hotmail.com

I can't wait to make something for the [ Little One in Your Life ]

name: Owl Beanie
description:
[ Description ]

These owl beanies are super cute!! Make and Adopt one for YOUR little one :) 
Simply pick your colors!!! Have fun, go crazy.. what about an Owl in your favorite sports team's colors? Nursery colors....

Made of 100% cotton yarn, soft enough for even the littlest of littles...

GREAT PHOTOGRAPHY PROP



[ Size ]

Newborn 12-14"
0-3m 14-15"
3-6m 15-16"
6-12m 16-17.5"
12-24m 17.5-18.5"
2T-4T 18.5-19.5"
Child 20-21"
Teen 21-22"
Adult 23"
Adult L 24"



If a size is not requested upon checkout I will send a Newborn size. Convo me for additional larger sizes...

[Checkout]
In message to seller upon checkout include size & color choices:

Size:
Ears:
Top:
Bottom:
Middle Eye Color:
Flower:
Braids: 1- 2- 3-



[ Production Time ]

MADE TO ORDER, check shop description for production times. This does not include shipping time once item is mailed.

[Shipping]

USPS First Class services are used, average time is 3-5 days in US. Upgrade to Priority is available, convo me PRIOR to purchase for separate listing.


[ Care.Instructions ]

Hand wash with mild soap in cold water. Do not twist to dry, gently press out excess water. Reshape and lay flat to dry. Placing in washing machine may unravel, ruin, felt item. Do not leave infants/children unattended in prop.


[ Questions ]

Please ask questions by emailing me prior to purchasing. littleowlcreations@hotmail.com
